en_title: Department of Justice responds to media enquiries

en: In response to media enquiries, a spokesman for the Department of Justice said today (July 4) that the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, has resumed work today after taking leave to receive treatment for intestinal discomfort, and that his medical condition will not affect his work.
zh: 律政司發言人今日（七月四日）回應傳媒查詢時表示，律政司司長袁國強資深大律師因腸部不適休假後已於今日恢復工作。司長的健康情況不會影響他的工作。

en: In response to media enquiries, a spokesman for the Department of Justice said today (July 4) that the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, has resumed work today after taking leave to receive treatment for intestinal discomfort, and that his medical condition will not affect his work.
zh: 律政司發言人今日（七月四日）回應傳媒查詢時表示，律政司司長袁國強資深大律師因腸部不適休假後已於今日恢復工作
司長的健康情況不會影響他的工作
